note.p: Civil engineer and conchologist. Queen’s College, Birmingham, 1859; King’s College, London, 1860–1. Engineer to the Water Department of Birmingham, 1861–84. Member of Birmingham Natural History and Microscopical Society.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/3004/99/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2020)
